input_descriptions.input_code: A string containing the initial code to be refined.
input_descriptions.input_goal: A string representing the main goal of the chain.
input_descriptions.input_sub_goal: A string representing the main goal of the code refinement task.
input_descriptions.error: An optional string containing an error message to consider during code refinement.

output_descriptions.output_code: A string containing the refined code based on the input goals, error, and initial code.
output_descriptions.status: True or False depending on if code is generated properly.
